QuestData.Title: The Child of Light and Shadow
QuestData.Description: It is time, $n.$b$bXe'ra is returned to us. We have Light's Heart. We have her Chosen One.$b$bCome, let us restore her. Let us forge a bright new path against our foes.$b$bSpeak to me when you are ready to begin.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Turalyon to revive Xe'ra.
QuestData.RewardText: I did not expect this of Xe'ra. Nor could I have foreseen Illidan's reaction.$b$bWe must ensure these events do not crush the spirits of our allies.
